name: Gun Shoot Zombie Pew Pew Ez Speedrun With A Lot Of Bug
name_original: Gun Shoot Zombie Pew Pew Ez Speedrun With A Lot Of Bug
description:
Control :

WASD for Movement

Shift for Sprint

R for Reload

1/2/3 or mouse scroll wheel to switch weapon

Left mouse click/ctrl for shoot

Right click for zoom in/zoom out/scoping (if available)

Gameplay :

- Fps gameplay

- You have 100 HP, hit 0 and you'll die

You've given 3 weapon which is

- Pistol with 15 bullets and maximum bullet that you can carry 30

- AK47 with 30 bullets and maximum bullet that you can carry 60

- Sniper with 10 bullets and maximum bullet that you can carry 10

if you run out of Ammo, find one

Objective : 

Kill every zombie, and finish the game ASAP...

- There's timer, but no Time limit...

*Ps

If you find out the game is lagging, uninstall it... it's not because you have a potato device, but because of my code is crap
